**HostSlick.com** has recently migrated its Premium SSD cPanel web hosting to a new Panel called DirectAdmin.

Our Shared Hosting, VPS, and Dedicated Server client base is continuously growing, we decided to set up more web hosting Nodes now as well.
Since DirectAdmin is also more cost-effective for us, it enables us to continue offering not only affordable but also High-Quality WebHosting. 

As you maybe know cPanel/WHM has released a high-cost increase for their Licenses which charges 0,20€ per account per month additionally to their increased base prices, which also would mean a price increase for our Clients. 
We however did decide to not use cPanel/WHM anymore and offer our clients the not only better but also as mentioned more cost-effective and simpler Solution. DirectAdmin.

DirectAdmin has as well a very user-friendly User-Interface, which looks simple and in our eyes, easy to use for our clients. It's not overwhelmed with loads of unnecessary features but the ones you will need to manage your Projects in the easiest way.
